H0.text: Weather varies more than climate over a summer.

H1.text: Climate varies more than weather over a summer.

H2.text: Climate varies, but weather stays the same over a summer.

H3.text: Weather and climate vary to the same degree over a summer.

A4.text: Climate is the long-term weather pattern in a region, typically averaged over 30 years.

A5.text: The difference between climate and weather is usefully summarized by the popular phrase 'Climate is what you expect, weather is what you get.'
